attributes.action: Government should cover all costs to repair flood damage to all  involved
attributes.additional_details:
National Flood warnings red alerts
Media coverage
Communities devastated and isolated
Placing the people in danger of life and limb
Government officials slow to respond
attributes.background: The government supported the European ban on dredging without looking at the consequences of this decision. Creating flooding on more than one occasion. Insurance costs for households and businesses too expensive. Government should be held accountable for all repairs and businesses losses.
